body:
I'd like to see support for GCS Buckets to serve as Spack mirrors.
### Rationale
When building packages on Google Cloud, it is beneficial to have commonly built package binaries, such as compilers, hosted on a GCS bucket to help reduce installation time on new GCE instances.

### Description
I've drafted some changes at https://github.com/FluidNumerics/spack that would be necessary to support GCS mirrors. This work is based on the AzureHPC approach ( https://github.com/Azure/azurehpc/tree/master/apps/spack ) but is being adapted for usage with GCS.

### Additional information
Starting from Spack version : `0.16.2-3078-cb009d0eab`

### General information

- [ x ] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [ x ] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Google Cloud Storage Spack mirror suport
